changeSet.author: cuenyad

and.sqlCheck: select count(*) from cvterm where name = 'FEMALE_PARENT_NAME' and cv_id = 1040 and is_obsolete = 0;
select count(*) from cvterm where cvterm_id = 8236;

changeSet.comment: Add 'FEMALE PARENT NAME' as germplasm descriptor
